hello:
Thiếu Nhi Thánh Thể
Holy Family
Auburn, WA
subline: This is the official website for the Holy Family Chapter or Ðoàn Thánh Gia (DTG). The Holy Family Chapter is located in Auburn, WA. We belong to the League of Chapters St. Ignatius Loyola, which is one of the eleven League of Chapters in the Vietnamese Eucharistic Youth Movement in the USA.
giveFeedback: Feel free to send us feedback about this website or how we're managing the Đoàn
